headline: Dover Earnings Surpass Estimates in Q4, Revenues Increases Y/Y
summary: DOV expects adjusted EPS of $9.30-$9.50 for 2025 and year-over-year revenue growth of 2-4%.

headline: Dover Delivers Strong Q4 Margins & EPS Beat, Stock Climbs On 2025 Optimism
summary: Dover Corporation (NYSE:DOV) shares are trading higher on Thursday after the company reported fourth-quarter results. Revenue stood at $1.93 billion, an increase of 1% year-over-year, missing the consensus of $1.95 billion. Segment earnings margin expanded 50 bps Y/Y to 22.2%. Total adjusted segment EBITDA margin expanded to 24.2% from 23.5% a year ago. Margin improved aided by favourable mix from the high margin, high growth platforms, and strict cost containment and productivity actions. The c

headline: Compared to Estimates, Dover (DOV) Q4 Earnings: A Look at Key Metrics
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Dover (DOV) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Dover Corporation (DOV) Tops Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Dover (DOV) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of 5.77% and 2.29%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Dover (NYSE:DOV) Misses Q4 Sales Targets
summary: Manufacturing company Dover (NYSE:DOV) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2024 as sales only rose 1.3% year on year to $1.93 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.20 per share was 5.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Dover Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Results
summary: Dover (NYSE: DOV), a diversified global manufacturer, announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ended December 31, 2024. All comparisons are to the comparable period of the prior fiscal year, unless otherwise noted.

headline: Dover beats quarterly profit estimates as pumps, fueling units strengthen
summary: Diversified industrial manufacturer Dover on Thursday beat fourth-quarter profit estimates, helped by the strong performance in its fueling solutions and pump system manufacturing segments. ...
